ChunkText: log in to your myumbc account, click on topics, then billing and personal finances, then payments and billing, then click on create new under the parent pin section to get this set up.
ContextBefore: bills can be paid in a number of ways, including those listed here on sbss website. you can grant a family member or another individual access to your bill if you needed.
ContextAfter: third party billing if your bill is paid by an outside organization, such as a scholarship from your home government, you can learn more about connecting your financial sponsor to umbc. scholarships undergraduates freshmen applicants, new, first-year students, are automatically considered for all general merit-based scholarships. they may also apply to umbc scholar programs or the yawh scholarship.
